scenarios.name: Brazil Frost / Supply Shock
scenarios.description: An unexpected late-season frost in Brazil's Minas Gerais coffee belt damages arabica crops, triggering a sharp rally in KC futures as supply concerns mount.

scenarios.name: USD Strengthening / Demand Destruction
scenarios.description: A hawkish Fed surprise drives the USD sharply higher, pressuring dollar-denominated commodities including coffee as emerging market buyers reduce import volumes.

scenarios.name: Vietnam Robusta Surplus Spillover
scenarios.description: Bumper Vietnamese robusta production floods global coffee markets, eroding arabica premiums and driving KC futures toward multi-month lows amid broad sentiment deterioration.
